attributes.action: Revise University Tuition Fee Changes in 2012/2013
attributes.additional_details: As tuition fees that universities are allowed to charge will be increased to (up to) £9000 per annum in 2012/2013- up from £3375 the year earlier- I suggest the government considers reducing annual fees, or introducing them more gradually. This allows potential students to prepare accordingly for this otherwise sudden increase of costs that would undoubtedly create a lot of financial indebtedness before students even begin a career.
